# size

**Instance Property**

The size, in bytes, of the opaque compilation options object.

## Declaration

```swift
var size: Int
```

## Specifying an options structure’s properties

- **data**: A pointer to the opaque compilation options object.

items.description: A pointer to the opaque compilation options object.
